MemoryInfobox.description: 'Having lost all to the Athens|Athenians, a beggar conspired to take back what was his now that Kassandra had ensured the Athenian forces were scrambling.'

General_Description: '''Begging for Revenge''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Following her actions, Kassandra eventually faced their fallout.
